columns.name: _pieceGroupGrossWeight
columns.description: Total gross weight of the piece group

columns.name: _uldContourCode
columns.description: Contour code as per IATA ULD Regulation

columns.name: _uldType
columns.description: Type of ULD as per IATA ULD Regulation

columns.name: _pieceGroupCount
columns.description: Number of pieces in the piece group

columns.name: _pieceGroupId
columns.description: Identifier of the piece group; increasing integers

columns.name: _slac
columns.description: Shipper's Load And Count  ( total contained piece count as provided by shipper)

columns.name: _uldSerialNumber
columns.description: Serial number that allows to uniquely identify the ULD
